worker module¶

worker.download(url, file)[source]¶

Download url content to file This downloads data and saves it with provided file name

worker.get_title(url)[source]¶

Returns title of webpage This loads web page based on url and return it title

worker.worker(q, s)[source]¶

Download threads This is threads for asynchronic content downloading
